mapper.select:
SELECT phNO, phNAME, phTEL, phADDRESS, phOP1s, phOP2s, phOP3s, phOP4s, phOP5s, phOP6s, phOP7s, phOP8s, phOP1e, phOP2e, phOP3e, phOP4e, phOP5e, phOP6e, phOP7e, phOP8e, phLATI, phLONG, REVIEWCOUNT, FAVCOUNT, RATING FROM PHARMACY P WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y'
AND P.phop8s IS NOT NULL
AND (P.phop1e >= 2200 OR P.phop2e >= 2200 OR P.phOP3e >= 2200 OR P.phop4e >= 2200 OR P.phop5e >= 2200 OR P.phop6e >= 2200 OR P.phop7e >= 2200)
AND P.phNAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.phADDRESS LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY P.phNO DESC LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PHARMACY P WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y'
AND P.phOP8 IS NOT NULL
AND (P.phop1e >= 2200 OR P.phop2e >= 2200 OR P.phOP3e >= 2200 OR P.phop4e >= 2200 OR P.phop5e >= 2200 OR P.phop6e >= 2200 OR P.phop7e >= 2200)
AND P.phNAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.phADDRESS LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT phNO, phNAME, phTEL, phADDRESS, phOP1s, phOP2s, phOP3s, phOP4s, phOP5s, phOP6s, phOP7s, phOP8s, phOP1e, phOP2e, phOP3e, phOP4e, phOP5e, phOP6e, phOP7e, phOP8e, phLATI, phLONG, REVIEWCOUNT, FAVCOUNT, RATING FROM PHARMACY P WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.phNO = #{phno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PHARMACY ( phNO, phNAME, phTEL, phADDRESS, phOP1s, phOP2s, phOP3s, phOP4s, phOP5s, phOP6s, phOP7s, phOP8s, phOP1e, phOP2e, phOP3e, phOP4e, phOP5e, phOP6e, phOP7e, phOP8e, phLATI, phLONG, REVIEWCOUNT, FAVCOUNT, RATING, STATUS ) VALUES( 0, #{phname}, #{phtel}, #{phaddress}, #{phop1s}, #{phop2s}, #{phop3s}, #{phop4s}, #{phop5s},#{phop6s}, #{phop7s}, #{phop8s}, #{phop1e}, #{phop2e}, #{phop3e}, #{phop4e}, #{phop5e},#{phop6e}, #{phop7e}, #{phop8e}, #{phlati}, ${phlong}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
